title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 168.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 168.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards for the
use of funds made available by the Legislature to provide financial assistance
to school districts and boards of cooperative educational services (BOCES) for
the operation of employment preparation education programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
168.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
